TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ForIn extends Microsoft.JScript.AST

Docs.summary: Represents the JScript statement. This class belongs to the abstract syntax tree category.

remarks.format: ## Remarks When the `for...in` statement acts on a <xref:Microsoft.JScript.JSObject>, it iterates through the properties of the object.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig class System.Collections.IEnumerator JScriptGetEnumerator(object coll) cil managed

Docs.param: The collection for which to get an enumerator.
Docs.summary: Returns an enumerator that iterates through the specified collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks If `coll` is a <xref:Microsoft.JScript.JSObject>, this method iterates through the properties of the object.
